ai-patthana22.22:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.22:0.3_0: always on the cause, underlying tendencies for safeguard.
ai-patthana22.22:1.1_0: or cause movement of the teaching ...
ai-patthana22.22:2.1_0: eleven objects in the same way. ...
ai-patthana22.22:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
